professional_summary: Experienced software engineer with over a year of experience in crafting, developing, and implementing dependable applications. Proficient in coding, debugging, and overseeing software systems in adherence to industry standards and best practices.

experience.description: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, ensuring smooth functionality on both Android and iOS platforms. Utilized native Android functionalities to improve the performance and user experience of the applications.

projects.name: Deep Learning Approaches for Detecting Common Skin Diseases Using Digital Image Processing
projects.description: Demonstrated expertise in machine learning and image analysis by utilizing deep learning models to automate skin disease detection via digital imaging in a collaborative research endeavor.

certificates.name: Participated in Hackermoral (Coding competition)
certificates.organization: INTECS, IT Faculty, University of Moratuwa
